description: Second sheet of the 2022 CalGreen Residential Mandatory Measures checklist (July 2024 Supplement). Covers pollutant control with full VOC limit tables for adhesives (Table 4.504.1), sealants (Table 4.504.2), paints (Table 4.504.4), and formaldehyde limits (Table 4.504.5). Also covers indoor air quality and exhaust (4.505), environmental comfort (4.506), resilient plumbing (4.507), interior moisture control, installer qualifications, and verification/documentation requirements (Section 703).
key_content: Adhesive VOC limits (Table 4.504.1): Indoor carpet 50 g/L, wood flooring 100 g/L, drywall/panel 50 g/L, multipurpose construction 70 g/L, contact adhesive 80 g/L, structural wood 140 g/L, PVC welding 510 g/L, ABS welding 325 g/L
Sealant VOC limits (Table 4.504.2): Architectural 250 g/L, non-membrane roof 300 g/L, single-ply roof membrane 450 g/L
Sealant primer VOC limits: Architectural non-porous 250 g/L, architectural porous 775 g/L
Paint VOC limits (Table 4.504.4): Flat coatings 50 g/L, non-flat 100 g/L, non-flat high gloss 150 g/L
Formaldehyde limits (Table 4.504.5): Hardwood plywood veneer core 0.05 ppm, hardwood plywood composite core 0.05 ppm, particleboard 0.09 ppm, MDF 0.11 ppm, thin MDF 0.13 ppm
Indoor air quality: bathroom exhaust fans ENERGY STAR rated, ducted to exterior (4.505)
Interior moisture control: moisture barrier beneath concrete slabs (4.507.1)
Installer qualifications: HVAC installers shall be trained and qualified (700.1)
HVAC duct protection during construction required (4.504.1)
SCAQMD Rule 1168 referenced for adhesive/sealant VOC compliance
